details:
adjective
- small and delicate
= example: small and delicate
= synonyms: elflike
- suggestive of an elf in strangeness and otherworldliness
= example: suggestive of an elf in strangeness and otherworldliness
= synonyms: fey
- usually good-naturedly mischievous
= example: usually good-naturedly mischievous
= synonyms: elfish, elvish
- relating to or made or done by or as if by an elf
= example: relating to or made or done by or as if by an elf
